T02D1691:42a-3: me tog phreng 'dzin gyi bstod pa /
T02D1691:42a-4: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1691:42a-5: phongs skyabs 'phags ma sgrol ma khyed zhabs lha tshogs rnams kyi mgo bo'i gtsug gi nor bu'i 'od //
T02D1691:42a-6: nyi ma 'char ka'i snang ba lta bur dmar ba'i phun sum tshogs pa phog pas dmar ba ni //
T02D1691:42a-7: smug rtsi dmar ba gsal po bkod nas shin tu yun ring ma lon pa dang 'dra dag la //
T02D1691:42a-8: mgo btud spyi bor thal sbyar bkod pa bdag gis bstod gsar me tog phreng bas gus mchod bgyi //
T02D1691:42a-9: rgal bar dka' ba'i sdug bsngal me nang lus lhung skal ngan phyogs gang zhig la brten snyam pa //
T02D1691:42a-10: blun zhing ci ci bgyi snyam lan cig ma lags
T02D1691:42a-11: rtsom bgyi don ma mchis pas dub pa bdag /
T02D1691:42a-12: mig nyams gzhan gyi 'gros kyis 'gro ba snang ba
T02D1691:42b-0: re bar @42b bcas pas nam mkha'i nyi zla yi
T02D1691:42b-1: // 'od ltar gzhan dag rnams las khums te sdig
T02D1691:42b-2: pa 'joms par mdzad pa khyod la brten par bgyid
T02D1691:42b-3: // // khyod kyi thugs rjes nges par sems can
T02D1691:42b-4: lam rnams kun la bye brag med par rab bzhugs
T02D1691:42b-5: // // shing // de dag bzung bas bdag 'dra'ang
T02D1691:42b-6: de dag rnams kyi nang du gdon mi 'tshal bar
T02D1691:42b-8: 'gro ba mtha' dag sdig mun nyi ma'i gzugs la'ang
T02D1691:42b-9: do zla mchis pa ma lags mod //
T02D1691:42b-10: de lta na yang kho bo sdug ba kye ma'o nyes byas ngan mkhas ngan pa rab tu brjid //
T02D1691:42b-11: nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis kyang mun pa rab tu mi bsal ri bo gangs can klung ngogs kyi //
T02D1691:42b-12: shang shong kha ba'i dum grugs dkrigs pas bsil bar
T02D1691:42b-13: dbyar skam rin chen gling gi tshong khang gi /
T02D1691:42b-14: nor bu'i phug yangs khang pa'i nang na dbul zhing
T02D1691:42b-15: 'jig rten kun gyi yum gcig bcom ldan 'das //
T02D1691:42b-16: khyod kyis mgon du bgyis kyang mgon pa mchis pas skal nyams bdag ni smad cing smad pa'i gnas //
T02D1691:42b-17: ma yang nu ma'i ched du rnam pa mang du du ba'i bu la skyo bar 'gyur ba lags /
T02D1691:42b-18: nyi ma re re dam pa ma yin don du gnyer la bskos pa'i pha yang khro sel na //
T02D1691:42b-19: khyod ni 'jig rten gsum 'dod 'bras bu yangs pa dpag bsam ljon shing yal ga mchog chen te //
T02D1691:42b-20: kun la mngon par 'dod don stsol yang khyod la nam yang rnam 'gyur 'ga' yang yod mi mnga' //
T02D1691:42b-21: gang dang gang zhig sdug bsngal tshogs mes lus bsregs de dang de ni nga yis bsgral lo zhes //
T02D1691:42b-22: nyid kyi dam bca' zhal bzhes sdug bsngal sa 'og bying ba bdag la 'bras bu bcas par mdzod //
T02D1691:42b-23: ji srid srog chags rnams kyis zil gnon rtsub ldan sdug bsngal shugs de 'phel ba de srid du //
T02D1691:42b-24: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa'i smon lam blo mnga' rnams la rjes brtse mnga' ba lags //
T02D1691:42b-25: yum gcig de ltar lag bsgreng bstod pa'i tshig zol cho nge'i nga ro dpangs mthor 'don pa la //
T02D1691:42b-26: gzhan gyis kyang ni btang snyoms bya bar 'os pa min na khyed 'dras lta zhig blos ci 'tshal //
T02D1691:42b-27: khyod las gzhan dag rnams kyis mngon 'dod 'byor pa don gnyer 'dod pa rnyed pa ma khums na //
T02D1691:43a-0: nang gi gdung ba rgyun chags @43a * //
T02D1691:43a-1: mi dga'i sa gzhi sran du med pas shin tu
T02D1691:43a-2: yang yang bsreg / gal te kho bo sdig can
T02D1691:43a-3: lags na kho bo'i khyod gus chen po 'di dag
T02D1691:43a-4: ci phyir 'phel // bden gsung mtshan tsam khums shing
T02D1691:43a-5: dran pa yis kyang khyod gcig kho nas nan gyis
T02D1691:43a-6: ci phyir 'phel // sdig sel ba // de yi
T02D1691:43a-7: phyir na khyod kyi kho bo'i bgyi ba'i khur bu
T02D1691:43a-8: bor ba ji ltar lags pa gsungs //
T02D1691:43a-9: nad pa 'chi bar 'gyur na'ang sman pa snying rje rgya chen sman 'phro gcod par bgyid dam ci //
T02D1691:43a-10: gang gi phyir na 'gron gnas rnga mo cha shas du ma'i thun mong ba ltar rgyu dang ni //
T02D1691:43a-11: ser sna nga rgyal la sogs rang skyon tha chad rnams kyis rim dang dus gcig bskul bas na //
T02D1691:43a-12: nyin gcig zhabs kyi padma mchod pa skad cig tsam yang ma rnyed de phyir khyad par du //
T02D1691:43a-13: bkren zhing phongs pa'i tshig dang yi ger bkod 'dis bdag la 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mchis par mdzod //
T02D1691:43a-14: lha mo gru chag chur bying snying rje dang bcas du ba'i cho nge g-yo med zhan pa rnams //
T02D1691:43a-15: khyod la mngon bstod lhur blangs pa yis 'phral du rgya mtsho dus mtha'i rlung gyen 'tshubs pa'i chu //
T02D1691:43a-16: gtsubs pa'i chu rlabs g-yo zhing 'gul ba'i rol pas dkrugs pas bteg pa'i rba rlabs 'gram ngogs la //
T02D1691:43a-17: brdabs pa'i sgra grag gad rgyangs can gyi pha rol 'gram du rang dga'i nyams kyis rgal par 'gyur //
T02D1691:43a-18: du ba 'khyil ba'i sprin nang 'thon zhing nam mkha'i khyim du 'phro ba'i me stag can gyi me //
T02D1691:43a-19: me lce 'bar zhing 'phro ba'i shugs kyis nang du zhugs pa'i khyim na mal du nyal ba rnams //
T02D1691:43a-20: khyod la rab btud thal mo spyi bor sbyar zhing ldab ldib gsol ba btab pas skad cig la //
T02D1691:43a-21: glog rab 'gyur ba'i sgeg pas dmar por gyur pa'i sprin gyi chu rlabs dag gis khebs par 'gyur //
T02D1691:43a-22: 'gram pa'i gdu bu myos pa'i chu yis gang ba gnyis ka la brten bung ba'i phreng ba yi //
T02D1691:43a-23: dar dir sgra yis bab pa'i ban glang zla bos zhe sdang me lce sbar ba'i glang chen gyi //
T02D1691:43a-24: mche ba'i rtse mo 'od li mthon po'i steng du lus po gzhag pa'ang khyod rjes dran pa yis //
T02D1691:43a-25: ri bo mthon po'i zom rtse'i mkhar la 'dug ba bzhin du dga' zhing 'chi bdag phyir zlog bgyid //
T02D1691:43b-0: mdung rings bsnun @43b bsad mi yi mgo dang gsal
T02D1691:43b-1: shing can gyi gtor ma'i ston 'gyed 'brog stong du
T02D1691:43b-2: // rkun po'i lag rtses bzung bas g-yo ba'i phub
T02D1691:43b-3: dang ral gris dregs pa shas cher 'thon gyur cing
T02D1691:43b-4: // // mig ni khro gnyer bcas shing smin 'khyog
T02D1691:43b-5: zur mig lta dang ldan rnams bran du sgo byed
T02D1691:43b-6: // // pa // de ni khyod mtshan dpal gzhi
T02D1691:43b-7: bsam pa'i smyu gus skyo ba med cing gsal bar
T02D1691:43b-8: // // pa // bris pa lags // rkang pa'i
T02D1691:43b-9: sbar mo rab rno rdo rje lta bus tshabs cher
T02D1691:43b-10: bsnun pas glang chen myos pa'i glang //
T02D1691:43b-11: bskams nas khrag mang zags pas bkrus pa'i ral pa gsal po 'jigs rung ya ngas gnya' khebs shing //
T02D1691:43b-12: khros te rgyang nas mgo la 'dzin 'dod mche ba rnon po gtsigs pa'i kha can ri dags dgra //
T02D1691:43b-13: khyod kyi 'thad pa'i spyod pa bstod pa'i don tshim mkhas la skrag ste log nas 'gro ba lags //
T02D1691:43b-14: du ba 'khyil 'dra mun pa'i gzugs can rnam 'gyur gdengs can phus 'debs grags pa'i 'gram dgang bar //
T02D1691:43b-15: bya ba'i ched du kha gdangs 'gyur ba'i lce can thag pa dang 'dra gshin rje'i zhags pa dang //
T02D1691:43b-16: sdig dbang gis phrad slar yang khyod kyi yon tan bgrang ba lhur len khyod bdag lhur byed pas //
T02D1691:43b-17: bung ba myos pa'i phreng ba'i gdub can autpala phreng ba'i rgyan gyis mdzes pa 'chang bar 'gyur //
T02D1691:43b-18: rje bos smin bskyod bskul te bkrabs pa rem zhing rtsub pas co to drangs shing gzings gyur pa //
T02D1691:43b-19: go khol bskyod pa'i tshig rtsub kyis spyos 'ching ba'i zhags pa rtsub mos nyer bcing bkres pa dang //
T02D1691:43b-20: skom pas mchu dang mgul pa gang zhing 'phags ma sgrol ma'i zhabs la skyabs 'gro ba //
T02D1691:43b-21: de ni byams pa'i gnyen gyis sbangs kyang ma rungs rgud pa de dag 'phral du sbang bar 'gyur //
T02D1691:43b-22: srin po sgyu ma sprul pa las tshul gyis byas bden pa ma yin gzugs brtsams cha lugs tshul //
T02D1691:43b-23: rnam 'gyur du mdag dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i mtshon cha'i 'od zer tshogs kyis mi bzad cing //
T02D1691:43b-24: mi ro brgyus pa'i rgyu ma'i tha gu'i tshogs dag phreng bar bkod pa rnams kyang khyod rgyus las //
T02D1691:43b-25: btus pa'i gsang sngags dran pas sdig bsal bsrung ba pham pa byed par 'gyur //
T02D1691:44a-0: chem chem sgra sgrogs char sprin lus can ban glang myos @44a * //
T02D1691:44a-1: chu'i klung gis rgyun gyi mun gtibs shing //
T02D1691:44a-2: mtshon cha glog ltar 'gyu ba'i 'od zer dang ldan mda' yi char 'bab g-yul ngo 'gyed ba'i tshe //
T02D1691:44a-3: phye mar rlog par byed cing dpung stobs che ba'i rnam par sdang ba rnams kyis bkag pa yang //
T02D1691:44a-4: khyod kyi spros pa gsol btab dpa' bo gcig gis dgra bo'i sa gzhi nan gyis 'thag par byed //
T02D1691:44a-5: sdig spyod rgyun chags las byung phol mig tshabs chen dag las rnag khrag rul pa zags pa yis //
T02D1691:44a-6: myags pa'i sha lpags dang 'bral rtsa sgo'i bu gar srog chags 'gul bas zos pas lus zad rnams ;
T02D1691:44a-7: / khyod kyi zhabs la brten pa'i sman mchog ri
T02D1691:44a-8: lu goms par bsten la rab tu dga' ba yis
T02D1691:44a-9: // sa le sbram dang 'dra ba'i lus dang ldan zhing padma dkar po ltar yangs mig can 'gyur //
T02D1691:44a-10: gang gi rna ba'i snod du bla ma rnams kyis nyer sbyar man ngag gleng mo ma lhung zhing //
T02D1691:44a-11: thos pa'i nor dang bral bas mkhas pa'i tshogs sar lkugs pa nyid du khas len gang yin pa //
T02D1691:44a-12: de yang khyod la gus pa'i nus pas rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i 'byor pa dang bcas pa'i //
T02D1691:44a-13: ngag gi dbang phyug thob nas mi bdag mdun sar rgol ba'i seng ge'i khri dag 'phrog par byed //
T02D1691:44a-14: sar nyal rngul gyis lus gos rked ngos mdoms dkris ras ral yan lag rnam par mngon 'gyur zhing //
T02D1691:44a-15: shig gis tshe dag rab gtser gzhan gyi khyim sgor rdza chag dum bur zas dag slong ba yang //
T02D1691:44a-16: khyod mnyes bgyis bas na chung mchog ngal rnams kyis g-yabs ba'i rnga yab kyis 'dzum mdzes pa'i sa //
T02D1691:44a-17: glang chen myos pa'i chu yis gdong pa'i mche ba gtams shing gdugs gcig gyen du bteg pa 'dzin //
T02D1691:44a-18: skye bo bkren pa rnams kyis yum gcig zhabs 'bring dang ni so tshis bzo yi spyod pa rnams //
T02D1691:44a-19: spong pa'i thabs kyis rnam grangs dag gis dub cing skye ba snga mar nyer blangs bsod nams kyis //
T02D1691:44a-20: nyer bsags dge 'bras nor ma thob dang nor bral rnams kyis phya las 'da' bar mdzad khyod la //
T02D1691:44a-21: gsol ba btab pas phyi nas nor bu sa las gter ni gser tshogs 'byung ba thob par 'gyur //
T02D1691:44a-22: 'tsho ba chad pas ngo tsha khyim thab gos zad
T02D1691:44b-0: @44b ma yis spyo bar byed cing bdag nyid ni
T02D1691:44b-1: // gso bar byed phyir gnyen 'dab bu dang gnyen
T02D1691:44b-2: bshes rnams kyis rgyang rings spangs par gyur pa yis
T02D1691:44b-3: // // khyod la rang gi sdug bsngal zhus pas
T02D1691:44b-4: rang gi khyim thab bud med gdu bu'i sil sil
T02D1691:44b-5: // // sgras // gnyid log sad par 'gyur zhing
T02D1691:44b-6: rta rmig rtse mos mtshams brkos khang khyim rnams kyi
T02D1691:44b-7: // // sgras // bdag po byed // gal te
T02D1691:44b-8: khyod kyi bka' drin cha shas tsam zhig mchis na
T02D1691:44b-9: phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'khor lo dang //
T02D1691:44b-10: bud med mtshan brgyan 'og pag chen po g-yo dang glang chen don po mche ba drug pa dang //
T02D1691:44b-11: rta mchog spu kha sdo bsangs rma bya'i mgrin ltar 'tsher dang yon tan dri med nor bu ni //
T02D1691:44b-12: nyi ltar mdangs ldan 'od can khyim bdag mdzod khengs blon po rtul phod dmag ldan 'byung bar 'gyur //
T02D1691:44b-13: khyod kyis rig pa'i grub pa thob pas tsandan chu yis dri zhim nor bu'i rdo steng du //
T02D1691:44b-14: sdu gu ma yis dus 'debs sdug pa dang rol rdzes su chags pas bde ba'i nyer spyad gsar //
T02D1691:44b-15: gus par sbyar zhing lag sbom mthon po ral gri'i 'od zer sngon pos dpung rgyan g-yo ba yis //
T02D1691:44b-16: rig 'dzin dbang po rang dgar gyur te m'a la ya yi me tog skyed mos tshal du 'gro //
T02D1691:44b-17: nu ma'i thon kor do shal gyis mnan mig dkyus ring pos rna ba'i autpala la 'gran cing //
T02D1691:44b-18: skra bskyil manda ra bas brgyangs pa'i ze 'bru sar
T02D1691:44b-19: pa'i dri yis myos pa'i bung ba dang ldan pa'i
T02D1691:44b-20: // lha yi bu mo rkang gdub rags pa'i sil
T02D1691:44b-21: snyan 'og pag sgra yi rgyun gyis shin tu dpangs
T02D1691:44b-22: // // bskyed pa'i 'dod dran dregs dga' khyod mgon
T02D1691:44b-23: ldan pa dag la gus dang bcas pas gsol ba
T02D1691:44b-24: // // 'debs // rdzing bu'i nang logs rin po
T02D1691:44b-25: ches spras gser gyi pad mtsho ze 'bru rdo rje'i
T02D1691:44b-27: ljon shing skye zhing me tog ze 'bru dri zhim
T02D1691:44b-28: rdul gyi bla re mthor bres te //
T02D1691:44b-29: lha yi grong khyer rangs bgyid lha mo bi wang gling bu sgrogs pa mkhas pas sil snyan ni //
T02D1691:44b-30: snyan par bsgrags pa'i dga' tshal lha mo khyod la mchod pa bgyid pas yun rings myong bar 'gyur //
T02D1691:44b-31: sems rgyud khyod la gtad pas bsod nams mthu 'bar rnams ni mdzes ma dag dang lhan cig tu //
T02D1691:45a-0: ga pur ae la li shi shing tsha aa ka ru dang @45a * //
T02D1691:45a-1: spang spos phye ma'i dri chu can //
T02D1691:45a-2: glong 'khor rba rlabs bud med sdu gu'i nu ma 'dod pa'i dregs pas 'bur ba'i skyibs 'khyil ba //
T02D1691:45a-3: dal 'bab gang g'a'i chu la chu rtsed chu ni drag tu 'thor bas rtsed mo byed par 'gyur //
T02D1691:45a-4: khyod kyi spyan ras mang du phog pas dag pa'i bka' la lha gtso dul ba'i khur bu yis //
T02D1691:45a-5: cod pan 'dud pa rnams kyis phyag byas mtho ris steng na lha yi glang chen thal gong ni //
T02D1691:45a-6: khrol khrol rgyan gyis spud pa la zhon lus kyi ba spu shas cher langs pa'i bde sogs kyi //
T02D1691:45a-7: lag rings 'do li bar med bskyil cing 'chang ba rdo rje dang 'brel lha yi yul las skyong //
T02D1691:45a-8: khyod sku gtsug gi rin chen rgyan gyi gdan bzhugs bde bar gshegs 'od mkha' khyab bla re can //
T02D1691:45a-9: nyi ma shar ka bye ba lta bur ches gsal 'od zer dag gis 'jig rten gsum 'gengs shing //
T02D1691:45a-10: zhabs gcig g-yas brkyang gom stabs chen po'i brjid la tshangs dbang khyab 'jug drag po rnams 'dud pa //
T02D1691:45a-11: bsgoms pas skye ba la brten rnams kyis srid pa'i 'jigs pa rgyun ni gcod par bgyid par 'gyur //
T02D1691:45a-12: la la khro ba dang bcas phyag tshogs phyag cha rnams kyi 'od zer dag dang 'brel pa yis //
T02D1691:45a-13: nam mkha'i khongs khyab sbrul gyi gdu bu'i gdengs ka dag gis spyod pa mi 'phrogs mi bzad pa'i //
T02D1691:45a-14: sdang rnams skrag mdzad gad mo'i cang te'u drag po brdungs bas brlang bskyed tshe na ro langs ni //
T02D1691:45a-15: thal mo'i sgra chen sgrogs pas bsgyings shing bsnyems pa'i rol pa chen pa'i ca co drags par khums //
T02D1691:45a-16: la sbu'i khung re nas byung nam mkha' khyab pa'i sar gnas sa 'og mtho ris gnas //
T02D1691:45a-17: tshangs pa dbang po la sogs lha dang klu dang dri za mi dang grub pa rnams gnas shing //
T02D1691:45a-18: phyogs tshogs khyab pa'i 'od zer la bzhugs bde gshegs brgya phrag sprul pa mtha' yas kyis dang //
T02D1691:45a-19: ngo mtshar khams gsum phyag 'os brtan dang g-yo bar gnas pa'i dngos po ma lus ngo bor khums //
T02D1691:45a-20: la las rgya skyegs li khri'i tshon 'dra nyi ma gzhon nu ches dmar lta bur dmar bar khums //
T02D1691:45b-0: de bzhin gzhan gyi dpal ldan aanda rnyil du btags pa'i phye ma 'thul @45b 'drar sngon por khums //
T02D1691:45b-1: la las 'o ma'i rgya mtsho dkrugs dang zho bas ches lhag dkar dang gser 'od ltar khums te //
T02D1691:45b-2: khyod sku sna tshogs ngo bor shes bzhin nye bar gzhag pa dang 'brel dbye bas tha dad 'gyur //
T02D1691:45b-3: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi grangs ni kun mkhyen ye shes sgron mes rab tu gsal ba yi //
T02D1691:45b-4: shes bya mtha' dag de nyid dbang gcig thams cad mkhyen pa dngos dang de sras kyis mkhyen te //
T02D1691:45b-5: bdag 'dra bya rog sgrogs ltar kha gdangs ku co cher 'don gang lags de ni mi bzad pa'i //
T02D1691:45b-6: sdug bsngal rims nad dag gis bskyed pa'i nad can sems kyi rgyud la bzhad gad rgyu zhig lags //
T02D1691:45b-7: bdag gis zhu ba gang lags de ni nang gi dang por khyod kyis khyad par du mkhyen cing //
T02D1691:45b-8: de bklag brjod pas ngal ba'i tshul ni mi mkhas
T02D1691:45b-9: rang sems tshi ma pa'i bye brag lags mod kyi
T02D1691:45b-10: // 'on kyang sdug par don shes zin pa'i gnyen
T02D1691:45b-11: 'dun byams pa'i mdun du 'dug bzhin tshig dag gis
T02D1691:45b-12: // // sdug bsngal phyung ste snying yang seng zhes
T02D1691:45b-13: byed pa nyid du gyur nas rnal mar gnas tshor
T02D1691:45b-14: // // bzhin // dge legs kun dga'i rgya mtshor
T02D1691:45b-15: zla ba'i cha shas gsal ma khyod bstod chu yis
T02D1691:45b-16: // // bzhin // yid dag par // bgyis pa
T02D1691:45b-17: bdag la tshim byed mthong ba stsol cig ye shes
T02D1691:45b-18: nyer bstan dag gis rgyas par mdzod //
T02D1691:45b-19: thugs rje shas ches nang gi mun sol gang phyir khyod kyi bstod pa tsam zhig kyang //
T02D1691:45b-20: don yod 'gro ba dag na skye dgu rnams kyi bde legs gnas ni gcig bu lags bar khums //
T02D1691:45b-21: khyod kyi yon tan tshogs kyi cha tsam bstod nas bdag gis 'di tsam zhes bya ma nges pa'i //
T02D1691:45b-22: bsod nams bkra shis 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mngar ba ro myang ma grol bar du longs spyad pa //
T02D1691:45b-23: gang thob de yis 'jig rten 'di ni 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug zhabs mthil bkra shis kyi //
T02D1691:45b-24: bde legs rtags can bde gshegs sras po'i grong khyer
T02D1691:45b-25: bde ba can zhes bya der myur 'gro shog /
T02D1691:45b-26: rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i bstod pa'i me tog
T02D1691:45b-27: phreng ba 'dzin pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen
T02D1691:45b-28: po thams cad mkhyen pa'i bshes gnyen zhes bya ba
T02D1691:45b-29: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rtse gcig tu byed
T02D1691:46a-3: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka na ka wa rm'a dang /
T02D1691:46a-4: bod kyi lo ts'a ba pa tshab nyi ma grags kyis bsgyur ba las /
T02D1691:46a-5: slad kyis pandi ta chen po ma ni ka shr'i dzny'a na'i zhal snga nas dang /
